entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestOnlyProductBehavior infrastructure used in installer tests patches codesigned binaries on macos resulting in test failuress. #91486
  • FileStream opened with FileOptions.DeleteOnClose does not work with FileShare.Read #91484
  • [API Proposal]: Initial capacity attribute for IEnumerable deserialization #91467
  • [API Proposal]: IKeyedServiceProvider Have a method to get all keys for a ServiceType, an option to make the keys services unique and the option to getservices return all keyed services #91466
  • Got Win32Exception when I send an HTTPS request #91464
  • [API Proposal]: Expose negotiated cipher suite and TLS protocols via HttpResponseMessage #91460
  • [Mono] Add basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector3 on Arm64 #91456
    9.0.0
  • There's gotta be a way for array to be able to store an unlimited amount of data with one final exception that say it can not, so https://source.dot.net/#System.Private.CoreLib/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/Convert.cs,e54b8e5a7f9d845a doesn't have to throw an exception here for example #91450
  • Visual Studio 2022 Community Shell Function runtime error #91449
  • [net7.0][mono][iOS] AOT fails for CommunityToolkit.WinUI.UI.dll #91444
  • Assertion failed 'store->TypeGet() == src->TypeGet()' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #91443
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Blittability check doesn't account for generic structs #90828
    9.0.0
  • ILLinker should special case facade assemblies #90469
    Future
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline broken with switch to net9.0 #91442
    9.0.0
  • Options generator perf improvements #91073
    8.0.0
  • Options source generator shouldn't use random names #90990
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Reflection documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88571
    8.0.0
  • Possible Issue With Dependency Injection Container Service Resolution #91366
  • Can't build runtime with recent SDK due to `IsTrimmable` errors #91010
  • Item4 is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91457
    8.0.0
  • Webassembly size and performance #91437
  • [browser][wasm] Request Streaming upload via http handler #36634
    9.0.0
  • TaskAsyncEnumerableExtensions.WithCancellation does not override a cancelled token with an active one. #91397
  • [browser] Migrate `WebAssemblyHttpRequestMessageExtensions` to runtime #91453
    9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on arm64 #83717
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `FileStream.DefaultBufferSize` #90157
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17.DroppedWatcher_Collectible #86564
    8.0.0
  • Bad codegen with Vector256/Vector512 #91325
  • Config generator overwrites existing properties when provided with empty config section #91380
  • Compiler error when using configuration binder source generator with custom collections #91324
  • Config generator doesn't match nullability semantics of built-in Bind #90987
    8.0.0
  • Update documentation for the Windows thread pool option #90444
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT is crashing on static interface method #90333
    8.0.0
  • native aot regression in .net 8.0 #91065
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2258306 #91485
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix usage of load library #91483
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package version #91481
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Switch the `AppWithSubDirs` project used for single-file tests to project that is built outside of test runs #91477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Condition EnableSingleFileAnalyzer #91474
    area-Meta
  • [maccatalyst] Make sure MacProxy is included in System.Net.Http #91473
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91472
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91471
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91470
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91469
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] [wasm] remove special StringContent handling #91463
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement timezoneinfo functions #91458
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [WIP][mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91455
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [PERF] Use the major version for the net_.0 version in create mono dotnet step #91452
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement ThisPtrRetBufPrecode::Init #91451
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Cleanup only changes #91445
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update CustomValidationAttribute ref to include missing properties #91441
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make `--skip-unresolved` the default when not running from SDK #90512
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Bump mono to -std=gnu11 #91421
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Opportunistically use stack allocation for GC dynamic events #91001
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Share more code between ILLink/ILCompiler test infra #91358
    needs-area-label
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package version #91285
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [7.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Add comment about support for null context in `hostfxr_get_runtime_delegate` #91479
    area-Host
  • [release/7.0-staging] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91422
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline #91446
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] Fix LDTOKEN of methods that have modifiers #91439
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix runtime dispatch to static virtuals on interface types #91440
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix arm64/arm32 cross-DAC #91438
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [nodejs] Remove experimental wasm arguments from template #91401
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Options Source Gen Fixes #91432
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91417
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono, 8.0.0
  • Disable analyzers in workloads.csproj to fix the workloads build. #91476
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91461
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix official builds for NativeAOT #91454
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Remove the minopts policy against cctors #90792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove some unused headers and functions #91177
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve DevContainer configuration for Codespaces #91465
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] [wasm] Request Streaming upload #91295
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] make sure that no assets errors are lost #91320
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [ARM64] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #91342
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.Bcl.Numerics.Tests: fix restore failure when DotNetBuildFromSource. #91402
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [FileSystemWatcher] Linux - Guarantee that we do not hold onto a strong reference of the watcher #91301
    area-System.IO
  • Fix runtime dispatch to static virtuals on interface types #91374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix LDTOKEN of methods that have modifiers #91382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [6.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90344
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.22
  • [release/8.0] Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #91373
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Add late binding lookup in VB.NET for COM objects #91433
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 8.0.0
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Adding a naive implementation of various primitive tensor operations #91228
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0-staging] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91424
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Reenable C4244 MSVC warning and fix occurrences #91395
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix NativeAOT unhandled exception stack trace #91415
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix formatting of assertion failures and fail-fasts #91300
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove browser wasm from perf_slow #91429
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V, LoongArch64] Fix assert(!regArgMaskLive) in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs #91414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Prevent other threads from writing to a session once rundown begins #91383
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix x64 crossbuild on macOS arm64 #91413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] ELT Profiler Bring-Up #91313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use SequenceEqual in BigInteger.Equals #91416
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
